message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.SE, cs.DS 

This paper deals with the detection of malware and data exfiltration over the DNS protocol, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR) and network security (cs.NI). The proposed solution also involves the use of machine learning techniques for anomaly detection (cs.AI) and rule-based filtering (cs.SE). Additionally, the evaluation of the solution involves the analysis of large-scale data (cs.DS).
